Body.original: You’re one step away from activating your account

translations.en: You’re one step away from activating your account
translations.th: อีกเพียงขั้นตอนเดียว บัญชีของคุณก็จะพร้อมใช้งานแล้ว
translations.zhs: 您只需一步即可激活您的账户
translations.zht: 您只需一步即可激活您的帳戶
translations.vn: Bạn chỉ còn một bước nữa để kích hoạt tài khoản của mình
translations.es: Estás a un paso de activar tu cuenta
translations.ptbr: Você está a um passo de ativar sua conta
translations.ar: أنت على بعد خطوة واحدة من تفعيل حسابك
translations.de: Sie sind nur noch einen Schritt davon entfernt, Ihr Konto zu aktivieren
translations.it: Sei a un passo dall'attivare il tuo account
translations.fr: Vous êtes à un pas d'activer votre compte

translations.th: อัปโหลดเอกสารประจำตัวของคุณ
translations.zhs: 上传您的身份证件
translations.zht: 上傳您的身份證件
translations.vn: Tải lên giấy tờ tùy thân của bạn
translations.es: Sube tus documentos de identificación
translations.it: Carica i tuoi documenti di identità
translations.fr: Téléchargez vos documents d'identité

Preheader.original: Please provide your ID documents

translations.th: โปรดส่งเอกสารประจำตัวของคุณ
translations.zhs: 请提供您的身份证件
translations.zht: 請提供您的身份證件
translations.vn: Vui lòng cung cấp giấy tờ tùy thân của bạn
translations.es: Por favor, proporciona tus documentos de identificación
translations.ptbr: Por favor, forneça seus documentos de identificação
translations.ar: يرجى تقديم مستندات الهوية الخاصة بك
translations.de: Bitte stellen Sie Ihre Ausweisdokumente bereit
translations.it: Per favore, fornisci i tuoi documenti di identità
translations.fr: Veuillez fournir vos documents d'identité

Subject.original: You’re one step away from activating your account

translations.en: You’re one step away from activating your account
translations.th: อีกเพียงขั้นตอนเดียว บัญชีของคุณก็จะพร้อมใช้งานแล้ว
translations.zhs: 您只需一步即可激活您的账户
translations.zht: 您只需一步即可激活您的帳戶
translations.vn: Bạn chỉ còn một bước nữa để kích hoạt tài khoản của mình
translations.es: Estás a un paso de activar tu cuenta
translations.ptbr: Você está a um passo de ativar sua conta
translations.ar: أنت على بعد خطوة واحدة من تفعيل حسابك
translations.de: Sie sind nur noch einen Schritt davon entfernt, Ihr Konto zu aktivieren
translations.it: Sei a un passo dall'attivare il tuo account
translations.fr: Vous êtes à un pas d'activer votre compte

translations.th: ข้อผิดพลาดที่ต้องแก้ไข
translations.zhs: 让我们来帮您解决这个问题。
translations.zht: 讓我們來幫您解決這個問題。
translations.vn: Hãy khắc phục.
translations.es: Arreglemos esto.
translations.it: Risolveremo questo problema.
translations.fr: Réparons cela.

translations.th: ส่งคำขอถอนเงินใหม่
translations.zhs: 重新提交提款请求
translations.zht: 重新提交提款請求
translations.vn: Gửi yêu cầu rút tiền mới
translations.es: Volver a enviar solicitud de retiro
translations.it: Invia nuovamente la richiesta di prelievo
translations.fr: Soumettre à nouveau la demande de retrait

Preheader.original: Let’s fix this.

translations.th: เราพบข้อผิดพลาดที่ต้องแก้ไข
translations.zhs: 让我们来帮您解决这个问题。
translations.zht: 讓我們來幫您解決這個問題。
translations.vn: Hãy khắc phục.
translations.es: Arreglemos esto.
translations.it: Risolveremo questo problema.
translations.fr: Réparons cela.

Subject.original: Let’s fix this: invalid details

translations.th: ข้อผิดพลาดที่ต้องแก้ไข: รายละเอียดบัญชีที่ไม่ถูกต้อง
translations.zhs: 让我们来帮您解决这个问题：无效的账户信息
translations.zht: 讓我們來幫您解決這個問題：無效的賬戶信息
translations.vn: Hãy khắc phục: Chi tiết không chính xác.
translations.es: Arreglemos esto: detalles inválidos
translations.ar: دعونا نصلح هذا: تفاصيل غير صالحة
translations.de: Lassen Sie uns das beheben: ungültige Details
translations.it: Risolveremo questo problema: dettagli non validi
translations.fr: Réparons cela : détails invalides

translations.th: ข้อผิดพลาดที่ต้องแก้ไข
translations.zhs: 让我们来帮您解决这个问题。
translations.zht: 讓我們來幫您解決這個問題。
translations.vn: Hãy khắc phục.
translations.es: Arreglemos esto.
translations.it: Risolveremo questo problema.
translations.fr: Réparons cela.

translations.th: ส่งคำขอถอนเงินใหม่
translations.zhs: 重新提交提款请求
translations.zht: 重新提交提款請求
translations.vn: Gửi lại yêu cầu rút tiền
translations.es: Volver a enviar solicitud de retiro
translations.it: Invia nuovamente la richiesta di prelievo
translations.fr: Soumettre à nouveau la demande de retrait

Preheader.original: Let’s fix this.

translations.th: ข้อผิดพลาดที่ต้องแก้ไข
translations.zhs: 让我们来帮您解决这个问题。
translations.zht: 讓我們來幫您解決這個問題。
translations.vn: Hãy khắc phục.
translations.es: Arreglemos esto.
translations.it: Risolveremo questo problema.
translations.fr: Réparons cela.

Subject.original: Let’s fix this: invalid account name

translations.en: Let’s fix this: invalid account name
translations.th: เราพบข้อผิดพลาดที่ต้องแก้ไข: ชื่อบัญชีไม่ถูกต้อง
translations.zhs: 让我们来帮您解决这个问题：无效的账户名称
translations.zht: 讓我們來幫您解決這個問題：無效的帳戶名稱
translations.vn: Hãy khắc phục: tên tài khoản không hợp lệ
translations.es: Arreglemos esto: nombre de cuenta no válido
translations.ptbr: Vamos corrigir isso: nome de conta inválido
translations.ar:
دعونا نصلح هذا: اسم الحساب غير صالح
دعونا نصلح هذا.
translations.de: Lassen Sie uns das beheben: ungültiger Kontoname
translations.it: Risolveremo questo problema: nome del conto non valido
translations.fr: Réparons cela : détails invalides

translations.th: เรียน {{firstname}},
translations.zhs: 亲爱的 {{firstname}},
translations.zht: 親愛的 {{firstname}},
translations.vn: Kính gửi {{firstname}},
translations.es: Estimado/a {{firstname}},
translations.it: Caro/a {{firstname}},
translations.fr: Cher/Chère {{firstname}},

translations.th: เริ่มต้นการซื้อขาย
translations.zhs: 开始交易
translations.zht: 開始交易
translations.vn: Bắt đầu giao dịch
translations.es: Comenzar a comerciar
translations.it: Inizia a fare trading
translations.fr: Commencez à trader

Preheader.original: Trade with Pepperstone

translations.th: ซื้อขายกับ Pepperstone
translations.zhs: 在Pepperstone进行交易
translations.zht: 在Pepperstone進行交易
translations.vn: Giao dịch với Pepperstone
translations.es: Comercie con Pepperstone
translations.it: Fai trading con Pepperstone
translations.fr: Tradez avec Pepperstone

Subject.original: Your demo account is ready

translations.th: บัญชีทดลองของคุณพร้อมแล้ว
translations.zhs: 您的模拟账户已准备就绪
translations.zht: 您的模擬帳戶已準備就緒
translations.vn: Tài khoản demo của bạn đã sẵn sàng
translations.es: Su cuenta demo está lista
translations.it: Il tuo conto demo è pronto
translations.fr: Votre compte de démonstration est prêt

translations.th: เรียน {[firstname]},
translations.zhs: 亲爱的 {{firstname}},
translations.zht: 親愛的 {{firstname}},
translations.vn: Kính gửi {{firstname}},
translations.es: Estimado/a {{firstname}},
translations.it: Caro/a {{firstname}},
translations.fr: Cher/Chère {{firstname}},

translations.th: เริ่มต้นการซื้อขาย
translations.zhs: 开始交易
translations.zht: 開始交易
translations.vn: Bắt đầu giao dịch
translations.es: Comenzar a comerciar
translations.it: Inizia a fare trading
translations.fr: Commencez à trader

Preheader.original: Trade with Pepperstone

translations.th: เทรดกับ Pepperstone
translations.zhs: 在Pepperstone进行交易
translations.zht: 在Pepperstone進行交易
translations.vn: Giao dịch với Pepperstone
translations.es: Comercie con Pepperstone
translations.it: Fai trading con Pepperstone
translations.fr: Tradez avec Pepperstone

Subject.original: Your Pepperstone demo account has been created

translations.en: Your Pepperstone demo account has been created
translations.th: บัญชีทดลอง Pepperstone ของคุณพร้อมใช้งานแล้ว
translations.zhs: 您的Pepperstone模拟账户已创建
translations.zht: 您的Pepperstone模擬帳戶已創建
translations.vn: Tài khoản demo Pepperstone của bạn đã được tạo
translations.es: Su cuenta demo de Pepperstone ha sido creada
translations.ptbr: Sua conta demo da Pepperstone foi criada
translations.ar: تم إنشاء حساب Pepperstone التجريبي الخاص بك
translations.it: Il tuo conto demo Pepperstone è stato creato
translations.fr: Votre compte de démonstration Pepperstone a été créé

translations.th: ยืนยันการยอมรับ:
translations.zhs: 接受确认：
translations.zht: 接受確認：
translations.vn: Xác nhận chấp nhận:
translations.es: Confirmación de aceptación:
translations.it: Conferma di accettazione:
translations.fr: Confirmation d'acceptation :

Preheader.original: You’ve read, understood and agreed to our RD as part of your application...

translations.en: You’ve read, understood and agreed to our RD as part of your application...
translations.th: คุณได้อ่านทำความเข้าใจ และยอมรับ RD ของเราซึ่งเป็นส่วนหนึ่งของการสมัครของคุณ...
translations.zhs: 您已阅读、理解并同意我们的RD作为您申请的一部分...
translations.zht: 您已閱讀、理解並同意我們的RD作為您申請的一部分...
translations.vn: Bạn đã đọc, hiểu và đồng ý với RD của chúng tôi như một phần của đơn đăng ký của bạn...
translations.es: Has leído, entendido y aceptado nuestro RD como parte de tu solicitud...
translations.ptbr: Você leu, entendeu e concordou com nosso RD como parte de sua inscrição...
translations.ar: لقد قرأت وفهمت ووافقت على إفصاح المخاطر الخاص بنا كجزء من طلبك...
translations.de: Sie haben unser RD im Rahmen Ihrer Bewerbung gelesen, verstanden und akzeptiert...
translations.it: Hai letto, compreso e accettato il nostro RD come parte della tua domanda...
translations.fr: Vous avez lu, compris et accepté notre RD dans le cadre de votre demande...

Subject.original: Confirmation of acceptance: DIFC Retail Risk Disclosure

translations.en: Confirmation of acceptance: DIFC Retail Risk Disclosure
translations.th: ยืนยันการยอมรับ: การเปิดเผยความเสี่ยงของลูกค้ารายย่อย DIFC
translations.zhs: 接受确认：DIFC零售风险披露
translations.zht: 接受確認：DIFC零售風險披露
translations.vn: Xác nhận chấp nhận: Tiết lộ Rủi ro Bán lẻ DIFC
translations.es: Confirmación de aceptación: Divulgación de Riesgos Minoristas de DIFC
translations.ptbr: Confirmação de aceitação: Divulgação de Risco para Varejo DIFC
translations.ar: تأكيد القبول: إفصاح المخاطر للتجزئة في DIFC
translations.de: Bestätigung der Annahme: DIFC Retail Risk Disclosure
translations.it: Conferma di accettazione: Divulgazione dei rischi al dettaglio DIFC
translations.fr: Confirmation d'acceptation : Divulgation des risques de détail DIFC

translations.th: ใบสมัครของคุณได้รับการอนุมัติแล้ว
translations.zhs: 您的申请已获批准
translations.zht: 您的申請已獲批准
translations.vn: Đơn đăng ký của bạn đã được phê duyệt
translations.es: Su solicitud ha sido aprobada
translations.it: La tua domanda è stata approvata
translations.fr: Votre demande a été approuvée

Preheader.original: Your IB application is approved

translations.th: ใบสมัคร IB ของคุณได้รับการอนุมัติแล้ว
translations.zhs: 您的IB申请已获批准
translations.zht: 您的IB申請已獲批准
translations.vn: Đơn đăng ký IB của bạn đã được phê duyệt
translations.es: Su solicitud de IB ha sido aprobada
translations.ptbr: Sua aplicação de IB foi aprovada
translations.ar: تمت الموافقة على طلبك كوسيط معرف
translations.it: La tua domanda di IB è stata approvata
translations.fr: Votre demande de courtier introducteur a été approuvée

Subject.original: Welcome to the Pepperstone Partners Program

translations.en: Welcome to the Pepperstone Partners Program
translations.th: ยินดีต้อนรับสู่โปรแกรมพันธมิตร Pepperstone
translations.zhs: 欢迎加入Pepperstone合作伙伴计划
translations.zht: 歡迎加入Pepperstone合作夥伴計劃
translations.vn: Chào mừng bạn đến với Chương trình Đối tác Pepperstone
translations.es: Bienvenido al Programa de Partners de Pepperstone
translations.ptbr: Bem-vindo ao Programa de Parceiros da Pepperstone
translations.ar: مرحبًا بك في برنامج شركاء Pepperstone
translations.it: Benvenuto nel Programma Partner di Pepperstone
translations.fr: Bienvenue dans le programme de partenariat Pepperstone

translations.th: ใบสมัครของคุณอยู่ระหว่างการตรวจสอบ
translations.zhs: 您的申请正在审核中
translations.zht: 您的申請正在審核中
translations.vn: Đơn đăng ký của bạn đang được xem xét
translations.es: Su solicitud está en revisión
translations.it: La tua domanda è in fase di revisione
translations.fr: Votre demande est en cours d'examen

Preheader.original: Account application received

translations.th: เราได้รับใบสมัครบัญชีของคุณแล้ว
translations.zhs: 已收到账户申请
translations.zht: 已收到帳戶申請
translations.vn: Đã nhận được đơn đăng ký tài khoản
translations.es: Solicitud de cuenta recibida
translations.it: Domanda di apertura del conto ricevuta
translations.fr: Demande de compte reçue

Subject.original: Your IB application with Pepperstone is under review

translations.en: Your IB application with Pepperstone is under review
translations.th: ใบสมัคร IB ของคุณกับ Pepperstone อยู่ระหว่างการตรวจสอบ
translations.zhs: 您的Pepperstone IB申请正在审核中
translations.zht: 您的Pepperstone IB申請正在審核中
translations.vn: Đơn đăng ký IB của bạn với Pepperstone đang được xem xét
translations.es: Su solicitud de IB con Pepperstone está en revisión
translations.ptbr: Sua aplicação de IB com a Pepperstone está em revisão
translations.ar: طلبك كوسيط معرف مع Pepperstone قيد المراجعة
translations.de: Ihr IB-Antrag bei Pepperstone wird überprüft
translations.it: La tua domanda di IB con Pepperstone è in fase di revisione
translations.fr: Votre demande de courtier introducteur auprès de Pepperstone est en cours d'examen

translations.th: การสมัครของท่านไม่ได้รับการอนุมัติ
translations.zhs: 您的申请未成功
translations.zht: 您的申請未成功
translations.vn: Đơn đăng ký của bạn không thành công
translations.es: Su solicitud no ha tenido éxito
translations.it: La tua domanda non ha avuto successo
translations.fr: Votre demande n'a pas été retenue

Preheader.original: Your IB is application rejected

translations.th: การสมัคร IB ของท่านไม่ได้รับการอนุมัติ
translations.zhs: 您的IB申请被拒绝
translations.zht: 您的IB申請被拒絕
translations.vn: Đơn đăng ký IB của bạn bị từ chối
translations.es: Su solicitud de IB ha sido rechazada
translations.ptbr: Sua aplicação de IB foi rejeitada
translations.it: La tua domanda di IB è stata respinta
translations.fr: Votre demande de courtier introducteur a été rejetée

Subject.original: Your IB application with Pepperstone has been rejected

translations.en: Your IB application with Pepperstone has been rejected
translations.th: ใบสมัครผู้แนะนำโบรคเกอร์ IB ของท่านไม่ได้รับการอนุมัติ
translations.zhs: 您的Pepperstone IB申请已被拒绝
translations.zht: 您的Pepperstone IB申請已被拒絕
translations.vn: Đơn đăng ký IB của bạn với Pepperstone đã bị từ chối
translations.es: Su solicitud de IB con Pepperstone ha sido rechazada
translations.ptbr: Sua aplicação de IB com a Pepperstone foi rejeitada
translations.ar: تم رفض طلبك كوسيط معرف مع Pepperstone
translations.de: Ihr IB-Antrag bei Pepperstone wurde abgelehnt
translations.it: La tua domanda di IB con Pepperstone è stata respinta
translations.fr: Votre demande de courtier introducteur auprès de Pepperstone a été rejetée

translations.th: สร้างผู้ใช้ 'บัญชีของฉัน'
translations.zhs: 已创建“我的账户”用户
translations.zht: 已創建“我的帳戶”用戶
translations.vn: Đã tạo người dùng 'Tài khoản của tôi'
translations.es: Usuario de 'Mi Cuenta' Creado
translations.it: Utente di 'Il Mio Conto' Creato
translations.fr: Utilisateur de 'Mon Compte' Créé

translations.th: เติมเงินทันที
translations.zhs: 立即注资
translations.zht: 立即注資
translations.vn: Nạp tiền ngay
translations.es: Financiar ahora
translations.it: Finanzia ora
translations.fr: Approvisionner maintenant

Preheader.original: We are glad to notify you that we have created a new user for you on Pepperstone's Secure Client Area.

translations.en: We are glad to notify you that we have created a new user for you on Pepperstone's Secure Client Area.
translations.th: เรายินดีที่จะแจ้งให้คุณทราบว่าเราได้สร้างผู้ใช้ใหม่สำหรับคุณในพื้นที่ลูกค้าที่ปลอดภัยของ Pepperstone
translations.zhs: 我们很高兴通知您，我们已在Pepperstone的安全客户端区域为您创建了一个新用户。
translations.zht: 我們很高興通知您，我們已在Pepperstone的安全客戶端區域為您創建了一個新用戶。
translations.vn: Chúng tôi rất vui mừng thông báo rằng chúng tôi đã tạo một người dùng mới cho bạn trên Khu vực Khách hàng An toàn của Pepperstone
translations.es: Nos complace informarle que hemos creado un nuevo usuario para usted en el Área de Clientes Segura de Pepperstone
translations.ptbr: Estamos felizes em notificá-lo que criamos um novo usuário para você na Área Segura do Cliente da Pepperstone
translations.ar: يسعدنا إبلاغك بأننا أنشأنا مستخدمًا جديدًا لك في منطقة العميل الآمنة لـ Pepperstone
translations.de: Wir freuen uns, Ihnen mitteilen zu können, dass wir einen neuen Benutzer für Sie im sicheren Kundenbereich von Pepperstone erstellt haben
translations.it: Siamo lieti di informarti che abbiamo creato un nuovo utente per te nell'Area Clienti Sicura di Pepperstone
translations.fr: Nous sommes heureux de vous informer que nous avons créé un nouvel utilisateur pour vous dans l'Espace Client Sécurisé de Pepperstone

Subject.original: Secure Client Area User Created

translations.th: สร้างผู้ใช้ในพื้นที่ลูกค้าที่ปลอดภัย
translations.zhs: 已创建安全客户端区域用户
translations.zht: 已創建安全客戶端區域用戶
translations.vn: Đã tạo người dùng Khu vực Khách hàng An toàn
translations.es: Usuario del Área de Clientes Segura Creado
translations.ptbr: Usuário da Área Segura do Cliente Criado

Body.original: Great news! Your Live TradingView account is up and running

translations.en: Great news! Your Live TradingView account is up and running
translations.th: ขอแสดงความยินดี! บัญชี live TradingView ของคุณพร้อมใช้งานแล้ว
translations.zhs: 好消息！您的 TradingView 真实账户已成功启用
translations.zht: 好消息！您的 TradingView 真實帳戶已成功啟用
translations.vn: Tin vui! Tài khoản TradingView của bạn đã được kích hoạt thành công và đang hoạt động
translations.es: ¡Buenas noticias! Tu cuenta Live TradingView está operativa
translations.ptbr: Ótimas notícias! Sua conta Live TradingView está ativa e funcionando
translations.ar: أخبار رائعة! حسابك المباشر على TradingView جاهز ويعمل
translations.de: Großartige Neuigkeiten! Ihr Live-TradingView-Konto ist einsatzbereit

translations.it: Finanzia il tuo account

translations.zht: 上傳您的身份證件

Preheader.original: There was a problem with your ID documents

translations.en: There was a problem with your ID documents
translations.th: โปรดตรวจสอบเอกสารยืนยันตัวตนของคุณ
translations.zhs: 您的身份证件存在问题
translations.zht: 您的身份證件存在問題
translations.vn: Có vấn đề với giấy tờ tùy thân của bạn
translations.es: Hubo un problema con tus documentos de identificación
translations.ptbr: Houve um problema com seus documentos de identificação
translations.ar: كانت هناك مشكلة في مستندات الهوية الخاصة بك
translations.de: Es gab ein Problem mit Ihren Ausweisdokumenten
translations.it: C'è stato un problema con i tuoi documenti di identità
translations.fr: Il y a eu un problème avec vos documents d'identité

Subject.original: You’re one step away from activating your account

translations.en: You’re one step away from activating your account
translations.th: อีกเพียงขั้นตอนเดียว เพื่อเปิดบัญชีเทรดของคุณให้เสร็จสมบูรณ์
translations.zhs: 您只需一步即可激活您的账户
translations.zht: 您只需一步即可激活您的帳戶
translations.vn: Chỉ còn một bước nữa là bạn có thể kích hoạt tài khoản của mình
translations.es: Estás a un paso de activar tu cuenta
translations.ptbr: Você está a um passo de ativar sua conta
translations.ar: أنت على بعد خطوة واحدة من تفعيل حسابك
translations.de: Sie sind nur noch einen Schritt davon entfernt, Ihr Konto zu aktivieren
translations.it: Sei a un passo dall'attivare il tuo account
translations.fr: Vous êtes à un pas d'activer votre compte

translations.th: ประเภทเอกสาร | รายละเอียดปัญหา | สิ่งที่ต้องดำเนินการ
translations.zhs: 文件类型 | 问题 | 所需操作
translations.zht: 文件類型 | 問題 | 所需操作
translations.vn: Loại tài liệu | Vấn đề | Hành động cần bổ sung
translations.es: Tipo de documento | Problema | Acción requerida
translations.ptbr: Tipo de documento | Problema | Ação necessária
translations.it: Tipo di documento | Problema | Azione richiesta
translations.fr: Type de document | Problème | Action requise

Body.original: Your funding request could not be processed

translations.en: Your funding request could not be processed
translations.th: รายการฝากเงินทุนของคุณไม่สามารถดำเนินการได้
translations.zhs: 您的入金请求无法处理
translations.zht: 您的入金请求无法处理
translations.vn: Yêu cầu cấp vốn của bạn không thể xử lý
translations.es: Su solicitud de financiación no pudo ser procesada
translations.ptbr: Sua solicitação de financiamento não pôde ser processada
translations.ar: تعذر معالجة طلب التمويل الخاص بك
translations.de: Ihre Einzahlungsanfrage konnte nicht bearbeitet werden
translations.it: La tua richiesta di finanziamento non può essere elaborata
translations.fr: Votre demande de financement n'a pas pu être traitée

translations.th: เริ่มการซื้อขายตอนนี้

translations.zht: 立即交易
translations.vn: Giao dịch ngay
translations.es: Comerciar ahora
translations.it: Fai trading ora
translations.fr: Trader maintenant

Preheader.original: Let's fix this: issue with your PayPal account

translations.en: Let's fix this: issue with your PayPal account
translations.th: เราพร้อมช่วยเหลือ คำแนะนำเกี่ยวกับบัญชี PayPal ของคุณ

translations.zht: 讓我們來幫您解決這個問題：您的PayPal帳戶存在問題
translations.vn: Hãy khắc phục: vấn đề về tài khoản PayPal của bạn
translations.es: Arreglemos esto: problema con tu cuenta de PayPal
translations.ptbr: Vamos corrigir isso: problema com sua conta PayPal
translations.ar: دعونا نصلح هذا: مشكلة في حساب PayPal الخاص بك
translations.de: Lassen Sie uns das beheben: Problem mit Ihrem PayPal-Konto
translations.it: Risolviamo questo: problema con il tuo account PayPal
translations.fr: Réparons cela : problème avec votre compte PayPal

Body.original: Your funding request could not be processed.

translations.en: Your funding request could not be processed.
translations.th: คำร้องขอการฝากของท่านล้มเหลว
translations.zhs: 您的入金请求未能通过处理
translations.zht: 您的入金請求未能通過處理
translations.vn: Yêu cầu nạp tiền của bạn đã không được xử lý thành công.
translations.es: Su solicitud de depósito no ha podido ser procesada
translations.ptbr: Sua solicitação de financiamento não pôde ser processada.
translations.ar: تعذر معالجة طلب التمويل الخاص بك.
translations.de: Ihr Einzahlungsantrag konnte nicht bearbeitet werden
translations.it: Non è stato possibile elaborare la tua richiesta di deposito.
translations.fr: Votre demande de financement n'a pas pu être traitée.

translations.th: ช่องทางการฝากเงินทั้งหมดของเรา

translations.zht: 查看所有入金方式
translations.vn: Xem tất cả phương thức nạp tiền
translations.es: Ver todos los métodos de depósito
translations.ptbr: Ver todos os métodos de financiamento
translations.it: Visualizza tutti i metodi di deposito
translations.fr: Voir toutes les méthodes de financement

Subject.original: Your funding request could not be processed

translations.en: Your funding request could not be processed
translations.th: คำร้องขอการฝากของท่านล้มเหลว
translations.zhs: 您的入金请求未能通过处理
translations.zht: 您的入金請求未能通過處理
translations.vn: Yêu cầu nạp tiền của bạn đã không được xử lý thành công.
translations.es: Tu solicitud de depósito no ha podido ser procesada
translations.ptbr: Sua solicitação de financiamento não pôde ser processada
translations.ar: تعذر معالجة طلب التمويل الخاص بك
translations.de: Ihre Einzahlung konnte nicht bearbeitet werden
translations.it: Non è stato possibile elaborare la tua richiesta di deposito
translations.fr: Votre demande de financement n'a pas pu être traitée

translations.th: มาแก้ไขปัญหานี้ไปด้วยกัน
translations.zhs: 让我们来帮您解决这个问题。
translations.zht: 讓我們來幫您解決這個問題。
translations.vn: Hãy cùng khắc phục vấn đề này.
translations.es: Arreglemos esto.
translations.it: Risolviamo questo problema.
translations.fr: Réparons cela.

translations.th: ส่งคำร้องการถอนงินอีกครั้ง
translations.zhs: 重新提交出金请求
translations.zht: 重新提交出金請求
translations.vn: Sau đó gửi lại yêu cầu rút tiền
translations.es: Volver a enviar la retirada
translations.it: Invia nuovamente la richiesta di prelievo
translations.fr: Soumettre à nouveau la demande de retrait

Preheader.original: We’ve tried to process your withdrawal but your PayPal withdrawal has been denied due to PayPal’s internal policy.

translations.en: We’ve tried to process your withdrawal but your PayPal withdrawal has been denied due to PayPal’s internal policy.
translations.th: เราได้พยายามดำเนินการเพื่อถอนเงินของท่านผ่าน PayPal แต่เราได้รับการปฏิเสธคำร้องในการถอนเงินเนื่องจากนโยบายจากทาง PaaPal.
translations.zhs: 我们尝试处理您的出金请求，但由于PayPal的内部政策，您的PayPal出金被拒。
translations.zht: 我們嘗試處理您的出金請求，但由於PayPal的內部政策，您的PayPal出金被拒。
translations.vn: Chúng tôi đã cố gắng xử lý yêu cầu rút tiền của bạn, nhưng PayPal đã từ chối vì chính sách nội bộ của Paypal.
translations.es: Hemos intentado procesar su retirada, pero ésta ha sido denegada debido a la política interna de PayPal.
translations.ptbr: Tentamos processar seu saque, mas seu saque do PayPal foi negado devido à política interna do PayPal.
translations.ar: لقد حاولنا معالجة طلب السحب الخاص بك ولكن تم رفض سحب PayPal الخاص بك بسبب سياسة PayPal الداخلية.
translations.de: Wir haben versucht ihre Auszahlung zu bearbeiten. Leider hat PayPal ihre Auszahlung aufgrund interner Richtlinien abgelehnt.
translations.it: Abbiamo provato a elaborare il tuo prelievo, ma il prelievo PayPal è stato rifiutato a causa della politica interna di PayPal.
translations.fr: Nous avons essayé de traiter votre retrait, mais votre retrait PayPal a été refusé en raison de la politique interne de PayPal.

Subject.original: Let's fix this: PayPal withdrawal declined

translations.en: Let's fix this: PayPal withdrawal declined
translations.th: แก้ไขปัญหา : การปฏิเสธการถอนเงินผ่าน PayPal
translations.zhs: 让我们来帮您解决这个问题：PayPal出金被拒
translations.zht: 讓我們來幫您解決這個問題：PayPal出金被拒
translations.vn: Hãy cùng khắc phục vấn đề này: Yêu cầu rút tiền qua Paypal đã bị từ chối.
translations.es: Arreglemos esto: Retiro de PayPal rechazado
translations.ptbr: Vamos corrigir isso: saque do PayPal recusado
translations.ar: دعونا نصلح هذا: رفض سحب PayPal
translations.de: Beheben wir das zusammen: PayPal-Auszahlung abgelehnt
translations.it: Risolviamo questo problema: prelievo PayPal rifiutato
translations.fr: Réparons cela : retrait PayPal refusé

translations.it: Ciao {{firstname}},

translations.th: ทำแบบทดสอบใหม่
translations.zhs: 重新参加测验
translations.zht: 重新參加測驗
translations.vn: Làm lại Bài kiểm tra
translations.es: Volver a hacer el Cuestionario
translations.it: Rifare il Quiz

Preheader.original: {{firstname}} you can resit the Quiz today

translations.en: {{firstname}} you can resit the Quiz today
translations.th: {{firstname}} คุณสามารถทำแบบทดสอบใหม่ได้วันนี้
translations.zhs: {{firstname}} 您今天可以重新参加测验。
translations.zht: {{firstname}} 您今天可以重新參加測驗
translations.vn: {{firstname}} bạn có thể làm lại bài kiểm tra hôm nay
translations.es: {{firstname}} puedes volver a hacer el Cuestionario hoy
translations.ptbr: {{firstname}} você pode refazer o Questionário hoje
translations.de: {{firstname}} Sie können das Quiz heute erneut ablegen
translations.it: {{firstname}} puoi rifare il Quiz oggi

Subject.original: You can resit the Suitability Quiz today!

translations.en: You can resit the Suitability Quiz today!
translations.th: คุณสามารถทำแบบทดสอบความเหมาะสมใหม่ได้วันนี้!
translations.zhs: 您今天可以重新参加适合性测验！
translations.zht: 您今天可以重新參加適合性測驗！
translations.vn: Bạn có thể làm lại Bài kiểm tra độ phù hợp hôm nay!
translations.es: ¡Puedes volver a hacer el Cuestionario de Idoneidad hoy!
translations.ptbr: Você pode refazer o Questionário de Adequação hoje!
translations.de: Sie können das Eignungsquiz heute erneut ablegen!
translations.it: Puoi rifare il Quiz di Idoneità oggi!

Body.original: Success! You’ve been classified as Pepperstone Pro

translations.en: Success! You’ve been classified as Pepperstone Pro
translations.th: ยินดีด้วย! บัญชีของคุณได้อัปเกรดเป็น Pepperstone Pro
translations.zhs: 恭喜！您已成功升级为Pepperstone Pro 账户
translations.zht: 恭喜！您已成功升級為 Pepperstone Pro 帳戶
translations.vn: Xin chúc mừng! bạn đã được nâng cấp thành Nhà giao dịch Cao cấp tại Pepperstone (Pepperstone Pro).
translations.es: ¡Ha sido un éxito! Has sido clasificado como Pepperstone Pro
translations.ptbr: Sucesso! Você foi classificado como Pepperstone Pro
translations.ar: نجاح! لقد تم تصنيفك كـ Pepperstone Pro
translations.de: Geschafft! Sie wurden als Pepperstone Pro eingestuft
translations.it: Successo! Sei stato classificato come Pepperstone Pro
translations.fr: Sucesso! Você foi classificado como Pepperstone Pro
translations.unnamed: 12: Succès ! Vous avez été classé comme Pepperstone Pro

Preheader.original: You can continue trading with leverage up to 500:1

translations.en: You can continue trading with leverage up to 500:1
translations.th: คุณสามารถทำการซื้อขายด้วยเลเวอเรจได้สูงสุดถึง 1:500
translations.zhs: 您可继续享受高达 500:1 的杠杆交易
translations.zht: 您可繼續享受高達 500:1 的槓桿交易
translations.vn: bạn có thể tiếp tục giao dịch với mức đòn bẩy lên đến 500:1
translations.es: Puede seguir tradeando con un apalancamiento de hasta 500:1
translations.ptbr: Você pode continuar negociando com alavancagem de até 500:1
translations.ar: يمكنك الاستمرار في التداول برافعة مالية تصل إلى 500:1
translations.de: Sie können weiterhin mit einem Hebel von bis zu 500:1 handeln
translations.it: Puoi continuare a fare trading con una leva fino a 500:1
translations.fr: Você pode continuar negociando com alavancagem de até 500:1
translations.unnamed: 12: Vous pouvez continuer à trader avec un effet de levier allant jusqu'à 500:1

Subject.original: Success! You’ve been classified as Pepperstone Pro

translations.en: Success! You’ve been classified as Pepperstone Pro
translations.th: ยินดีด้วย! บัญชีของคุณได้อัปเกรดเป็น Pepperstone Pro
translations.zhs: 恭喜！您已成功升级为Pepperstone Pro 账户
translations.zht: 恭喜！您已成功升級為 Pepperstone Pro 帳戶
translations.vn: Xin chúc mừng! bạn đã được nâng cấp thành Nhà giao dịch Pro tại Pepperstone.
translations.es: ¡Ha sido un éxito! Has sido clasificado como Pepperstone Pro
translations.ptbr: Sucesso! Você foi classificado como Pepperstone Pro
translations.ar: نجاح! لقد تم تصنيفك كـ Pepperstone Pro
translations.de: Geschafft! Sie wurden als Pepperstone Pro eingestuft
translations.it: Successo! Sei stato classificato come Pepperstone Pro
translations.fr: Sucesso! Você foi classificado como Pepperstone Pro
translations.unnamed: 12: Succès ! Vous avez été classé comme Pepperstone Pro

translations.th: إشعار إيقاف الخسارة

translations.vn: 強制平倉通知

translations.th: معلومات الحساب الهامة
translations.zhs: ข้อมูลสำคัญเกี่ยวกับบัญชีของคุณ
translations.zht: 重要账户信息

translations.es: Thông tin quan trọng về tài khoản
translations.it: Informazioni importanti sull'account
translations.fr: Informations importantes sur le compte

Body.original: Great news! Your Demo TradingView account is up and running

translations.en: Great news! Your Demo TradingView account is up and running
translations.th: ขอแสดงความยินดี! บัญชี Demo TradingView ของคุณพร้อมใช้งานแล้ว
translations.zhs: 好消息！您的 TradingView 模拟账户已成功启用
translations.zht: 好消息！您的 TradingView 模擬帳戶已成功啟用
translations.vn: Tin vui! Tài khoản TradingView của Quý Khách đã được kích hoạt thành công và đang hoạt động
translations.es: ¡Buenas noticias! Tu cuenta Demo TradingView está operativa
translations.ptbr: Ótimas notícias! Sua conta Demo TradingView está ativa e funcionando
translations.ar: أخبار رائعة! حسابك التجريبي على TradingView جاهز ويعمل
translations.de: Großartige Neuigkeiten! Ihr Demo-TradingView-Konto ist einsatzbereit
translations.it: Grandi notizie! Il tuo conto Demo TradingView è attivo e funzionante

translations.th: เชื่อมต่อกับ TradingView
translations.zhs: 连接至 TradingView
translations.zht: 連接至 TradingView
translations.vn: Kết nối với TradingView
translations.es: Conectarse a TradingView
translations.it: Connettiti a TradingView

Preheader.original: Great news! Your Demo TradingView account is up and running

translations.en: Great news! Your Demo TradingView account is up and running
translations.th: ขอแสดงความยินดี! บัญชี Demo TradingView ของคุณพร้อมใช้งานแล้ว
translations.zhs: 好消息！您的 TradingView 模拟账户已成功启用
translations.zht: 好消息！您的 TradingView 模擬帳戶已成功啟用
translations.vn: Tin vui! Tài khoản Demo TradingView của bạn đã được kích hoạt thành công và đang hoạt động.
translations.es: ¡Buenas noticias! Tu cuenta Demo TradingView está operativa
translations.ptbr: Ótimas notícias! Sua conta Demo TradingView está pronta e funcionando
translations.ar: أخبار رائعة! حسابك التجريبي على TradingView جاهز ويعمل
translations.de: Großartige Neuigkeiten! Ihr Demo-TradingView-Konto ist einsatzbereit
translations.it: Grandi notizie! Il tuo conto Demo TradingView è attivo e funzionante

Subject.original: Your Demo account is ready

translations.th: บัญชี Demo ของคุณพร้อมใช้งานแล้ว
translations.zhs: 您的模拟账户已准备就绪
translations.zht: 您的模擬帳戶已準備就緒
translations.vn: Tài khoản Demo của bạn đã sẵn sàng
translations.es: Tu cuenta Demo está lista
translations.ptbr: Sua conta de demonstração está pronta
translations.it: Il tuo conto demo è pronto

translations.th: ดำเนินการแก้ไขข้อผิดพลาดนี้
translations.zhs: 让我们来帮您解决这个问题。
translations.zht: 讓我們來幫您解決這個問題。
translations.vn: Hãy cùng khắc phục vấn đề này.
translations.es: Arreglemos esto.
translations.it: Risolviamo questo problema.
translations.fr: Réparons cela.

translations.th: ส่งคำร้องขอถอนเงินอีกครั้ง
translations.zhs: 重新提交出金请求
translations.zht: 重新提交出金請求
translations.vn: Hãy gửi lại yêu cầu rút tiền
translations.es: Volver a presentar la retirada
translations.it: Richiedi nuovamente il prelievo
translations.fr: Soumettre à nouveau la demande de retrait

Preheader.original: Unfortunately, we couldn’t process your withdrawal because...

translations.en: Unfortunately, we couldn’t process your withdrawal because...
translations.th: เราต้องขอแจ้งให้ท่านทราบว่า เราไม่สามารถดำเนินคำร้องขอการถอนเงินของท่านได้เนื่องจาก ...
translations.zhs: 很遗憾，我们无法处理您的出金请求，因为。。。
translations.zht: 很遺憾，我們無法處理您的出金請求，因為。。。
translations.vn: Rất tiếc chúng tôi không thể xử lý yêu cầu rút tiền của bạn vì...
translations.es: Lamentablemente, no hemos podido procesar tu retirada porque...
translations.ptbr: Infelizmente, não conseguimos processar seu saque porque...
translations.ar: للأسف، لم نتمكن من معالجة عملية السحب الخاصة بك لأن...
translations.de: Leider konnten wir ihre Auszahlung nicht bearbeiten, da...
translations.it: Purtroppo non siamo riusciti a elaborare il tuo prelievo perché...
translations.fr: Malheureusement, nous n'avons pas pu traiter votre retrait parce que...

Subject.original: Something went wrong with your withdrawal

translations.en: Something went wrong with your withdrawal
translations.th: มีบางสิ่งผิดพลาดจากคำร้องขอถอนเงินของท่าน
translations.zhs: 您的出金请求遇到异常
translations.zht: 您的出金請求遇到異常
translations.vn: Đã xảy ra sự cố với yêu cầu rút tiền tại tài khoản.
translations.es: Algo ha ido mal con tu retirada
translations.ptbr: Algo deu errado com seu saque
translations.ar: حدث خطأ ما في عملية السحب الخاصة بك
translations.de: Bei ihrer Auszahlung ist etwas schiefgelaufen
translations.it: Qualcosa è andato storto con il tuo prelievo
translations.fr: Un problème est survenu avec votre retrait

translations.th: ดำเนินการแก้ไขข้อผิดพลาดนี้
translations.zhs: 让我们来帮您解决这个问题。
translations.zht: 讓我們來幫您解決這個問題。
translations.vn: Hãy cùng khắc phục vấn đề này.
translations.es: Arreglemos esto.
translations.it: Risolviamo questo problema.
translations.fr: Réparons cela.

translations.th: ืทำรายการถอนอีกครั้ง
translations.zhs: 重新提交出金请求
translations.zht: 重新提交出金請求
translations.vn: Hãy gửi lại yêu cầu rút tiền
translations.es: Volver a enviar la retirada
translations.it: Richiedi nuovamente il prelievo
translations.fr: Soumettre à nouveau la demande de retrait

Preheader.original: We’ve tried to process your withdrawal but your Neteller ID doesn’t seem to be correct.

translations.en: We’ve tried to process your withdrawal but your Neteller ID doesn’t seem to be correct.
translations.th: เราได้พยายามดำเนินการถอนเงิน แต่ Neteller ID ของคุณได้แจ้งว่าเกิดข้อมูลผิดพลาด
translations.zhs: 我们已尝试处理您的出金请求，但您的 Neteller ID 似乎不正确。
translations.zht: 我們已嘗試處理您的出金請求，但您的 Neteller ID 似乎不正確。
translations.vn: Chúng tôi đã cố gắng xử lý yêu cầu rút tiền của bạn, nhưng có vẻ như tài khoản Neteller ID của bạn đã được nhập không chính xác.
translations.es: Hemos intentado procesar tu retirada pero tu ID de Neteller no parece ser correcto.
translations.ptbr: Tentamos processar seu saque, mas seu ID Neteller parece não estar correto.
translations.ar: لقد حاولنا معالجة عملية السحب الخاصة بك ولكن يبدو أن معرف Neteller الخاص بك لا يبدو صحيحًا.
translations.de: Wir haben versucht, ihre Auszahlung zu bearbeiten. Leider scheint ihre Neteller-ID nicht korrekt zu sein.
translations.it: Abbiamo provato a elaborare il tuo prelievo ma il tuo ID Neteller non sembra essere corretto.
translations.fr: Nous avons essayé de traiter votre retrait, mais votre identifiant Neteller ne semble pas correct.

Subject.original: Let's fix this: invalid Neteller ID

translations.en: Let's fix this: invalid Neteller ID
translations.th: ข้อผิดพลาดที่ต้องแก้ไข:  Neteller ID ของคุณไม่ถูกต้อง
translations.zhs: 让我们来帮您解决这个问题：Neteller ID无效
translations.zht: 讓我們來幫您解決這個問題：Neteller ID 無效
translations.vn: Hãy cùng khắc phục vấn đề này: Thông tin ID Neteller không hợp lệ
translations.es: Vamos a solucionarlo: ID de Neteller no válido
translations.ptbr: Vamos corrigir isso: ID Neteller inválido
translations.ar: دعونا نصلح هذا: معرف Neteller غير صالح
translations.it: Risolviamo questo problema: ID Neteller non valido
translations.fr: Réparons cela : identifiant Neteller invalide

translations.th: เราพร้อมช่วยเหลือ
translations.zhs: 让我们来帮您解决这个问题。
translations.zht: 讓我們來幫您解決這個問題。
translations.vn: Hãy cùng khắc phục vấn đề này.
translations.es: Vamos a arreglar esto.
translations.it: Risolviamo questo problema.
translations.fr: Réparons cela

translations.th: ทำรายการถอนอีกครั้ง
translations.zhs: 重新提交出金请求
translations.zht: 重新提交出金請求
translations.vn: Hãy gửi lại yêu cầu rút tiền
translations.es: Volver a presentar la retirada
translations.it: Richiedi nuovamente il prelievo
translations.fr: Soumettre à nouveau la demande de retrait

Preheader.original: Unfortunately, due to the Anti-Money Laundering (AML) policy

translations.en: Unfortunately, due to the Anti-Money Laundering (AML) policy
translations.th: น่าเสียดาย เนื่องจากนโยบายการต่อต้านการฟอกเงิน (AML)
translations.zhs: 很遗憾，由于反洗钱（AML）政策的要求，我们无法将您的资金转账至第三方。
translations.zht: 很遺憾，由於反洗錢（AML）政策的要求，我們無法將您的資金轉賬至第三方。
translations.vn: Rất tiếc, do chính sách Chống Rửa Tiền (AML)
translations.es: Lamentablemente, debido a la política de lucha contra el blanqueo de dinero (AML)
translations.ptbr: Infelizmente, devido à política de Anti-Lavagem de Dinheiro (AML)
translations.ar: لسوء الحظ، بسبب سياسة مكافحة غسيل الأموال (AML)
translations.de: Leider können wir aufgrund der Anti-Geldwäsche (AML) Richtlinie
translations.it: Sfortunatamente, a causa della politica antiriciclaggio (AML).
translations.fr: Malheureusement, en raison de la politique de Lutte contre le Blanchiment d'Argent (AML)

Subject.original: Let’s fix this: invalid details

translations.th: ข้อผิดพลาดที่ต้องแก้ไข: รายละเอียดไม่ถูกต้อง
translations.zhs: 让我们来帮您解决这个问题：无效信息
translations.zht: 讓我們來幫您解決這個問題：無效信息
translations.vn: Hãy cùng khắc phục vấn đề này: Thông tin tài khoản không hợp lệ
translations.es: Vamos a arreglarlo: datos no válidos
translations.ar: دعونا نصلح هذا: تفاصيل غير صالحة
translations.de: Lassen Sie uns das beheben: ungültige Details
translations.it: Risolviamo questo problema: dettagli non validi
translations.fr: Réparons cela : détails invalides
